item.title: Blog III: Choosing the Correct Regression Model
item.description: The process of deciding which independent variables to include and remove from a regression equation is known as model specification. How do you choose the most appropriate regression model? The world is complex, and attempting to understand it with a limited sample size is futile. In this article, I’ll show you how to choose the right one. When a researcher needs to mathematically describe the relationship between independent variables and the dependent variable, model selection is often needed.
